def_en: A baby is a very young child, especially one that cannot yet walk or talk.
A baby animal is a very young animal.
Baby vegetables are vegetables picked when they are very small.

def_cn: 宝贝儿（昵称，尤用于年轻女性）
def_en: Some people use baby as an affectionate way of addressing someone, especially a young woman, or referring to them.

def_cn: 把婴儿和洗澡水一起倒掉；将精华连同糟粕一起丢弃；不分好坏地全盘抛弃
def_en: If you throw the baby out with the bath water, you lose the good parts of something as well as the bad parts, because you reject it as a whole instead of just removing what is bad.

def_cn: 替他人擦屁股；替别人干苦差事
def_en: If you are left holding the baby, you are put in a situation where you are responsible for something, often in an unfair way because other people fail or refuse to take responsibility for it.
